Four ingenious leaps forward that enabled icebreakers to evolve …from BIG to BIGGER into the Arctic Ocean's BIGGEST(n)

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: Fish biologist and conservationist Dr. Zeb Hogan travels to Khone Falls in Laos in search of the ultimate fish superhighway. Here, at one of the world's largest waterfalls, Zeb hopes to see which channels giant fish use to migrate upriver to their spawning grounds. Zeb's mission is urgent; dozens of dams are scheduled to be built along this river and this could affect fish migrations. To help find these channels Zeb enlists the assistance of Trip Jennings, a National Geographic Young Explorer, and his team of world-class kayakers. They will run some of the world's most dangerous whitewater2 to map the river bottom - something no one has ever done before3. Using specialized kayaks,Trip and his team hope to collect river gradient and depth; factors that will help determine which channels the fish climb. Zeb also fishes with local fishermen, witnesses an amazing mass fish migration and discovers an important channel that fish, including the Mekong giant catfish, use to migrate. But plans to dam the channel could block the migratory routes and place the lives of fish, and the millions of people who depend on them for their livelihoods5, at risk. Zeb hopes the information the team collects will help the authorities understand the importance of fish and fisheries in this area before they decide to proceed with the construction of dams(n)

programme.title: Preživjeti pleme
Survive The Tribe
programme.desc: Mongolian Kazakhs put Hazen Audel to the test as he attempts to survive frigid temperatures and hunt with golden eagles. Before heading out into the Altai Mountains on a semi-wild horse, Hazen must train and bond with his predatory eagle in order to ensure success on the hunt(n)

programme.title: Zatočeni u inozemstvu
Banged up abroad
programme.desc: This special episode of the hit series Banged Up Abroad will tell the story behind the Oscar-winning movie Argo. Retired CIA officer and master of disguise, Antonio Mendez portrayed in the movie by Ben Affleck will tell the story of how, at the height of the Iranian hostage crisis he came up with an audacious plan to rescue six diplomats who had escaped the U.S. Embassy in Tehran. Desperate for a cover story that would allow him to swoop into Iran and smuggle the diplomats out through the airport, Mendez hit upon a wild idea - pose as a Hollywood film crew. It sounded crazy, but as the only viable plan Mendez has little choice but to carry out one of the riskiest mission of his career(n)

programme.title: Velik, veći, najveći
programme.desc: Weighing in at over 93 thousand tonnes, the Timofey Guzhenko is by far the biggest icebreaking ship to operate in the Arctic Ocean. It can smash through solid ice a metre and a half thick and pulverise blocks of ice the size of a car with its huge propellers. This film explores icebreaking ship technology through four historic engineering breakthroughs. The film explores the inner workings of landmark icebreakers, including the world's first icebreaker, the German Eisbrecher 1 and the powerful nuclear powered Soviet icebreaker, the Lenin. Each features a major technological innovation that allowed engineers to build bigger icebreakers. Using stunning CGI animation, this film reveals the incredible stories behind these machines. Four ingenious leaps forward that enabled icebreakers to evolve …from BIG to BIGGER into the Arctic Ocean's BIGGEST(n)

programme.title: Antičke megastrukture
Ancient megastructures
programme.desc: When fiery Roman Emperor Justinian ordered the rebuilding of the great church of Hagia Sophia in Istanbul, he was bidding for nothing less than eternal glory, both for God and for himself. Exactly how the Romans conjured up the vast golden dome floating high above the ground has astounded architects for centuries, and modern science has only recently revealed the secret that allowed this colossal structure to survive almost 1500 years of turbulent history and earthquakes. We peel back the layers of this ancient megastructure to reveal its incredible engineering secrets, and vividly bring to life the astonishing story of its construction(n)

programme.title: Hakiranje sustava
Hacking The System
programme.desc: Catastrophes strike without warning - let Brian show you how to take every day items from your house and turn them into life-saving hacks(n)

programme.title: Hakiranje sustava
Hacking The System
programme.desc: Brian utilises hacks to get the upper hand, from getting that dream job to scoring big at the races. Will he win it all? Tune in to found out(n)

programme.title: Planet mesoždera
Planet Carnivore
programme.desc: Katmai on the Alaskan Peninsula is a kingdom of riches - and it is full of danger. For twelve seasons, "Custa", a powerful Alaskan brown bear, has dominated the valley's treacherous corridors. But this season, a regime change is in the air(n)

programme.title: Zatočeni u inozemstvu
Banged up abroad
programme.desc: This special episode of the hit series Banged Up Abroad will tell the story behind the Oscar-winning movie Argo. Retired CIA officer and master of disguise, Antonio Mendez portrayed in the movie by Ben Affleck will tell the story of how, at the height of the Iranian hostage crisis he came up with an audacious plan to rescue six diplomats who had escaped the U.S. Embassy in Tehran. Desperate for a cover story that would allow him to swoop into Iran and smuggle the diplomats out through the airport, Mendez hit upon a wild idea - pose as a Hollywood film crew. It sounded crazy, but as the only viable plan Mendez has little choice but to carry out one of the riskiest mission of his career(n)

programme.title: Ukleti brod
Ghost Ship
programme.desc: A mystery wreck is found on the bottom of the Baltic Sea. The first images reveal an almost perfect example of a Dutch cargo vessel from the 17th century. Remarkably preserved, this ship opens a window to the long lost world of global European trade and exploration. For archaeologists, it poses a tantalizing opportunity to study the past, but its depth may place the wreck just out of their reach. Maritime archaeologists investigate a 17th century wooden shipwreck sunk 425 feet deep in the Baltic Sea. Using robots and high tech equipment, an extremely rare wooden sculpture is salvaged from the nearly intact ship. In a blend of adventure, science and cutting-edge technology, the team creates a unique 3-D model to recreate the wreck in detail(n)

programme.title: Ukleti brodovi na Velikim jezerima
Ghost Ships of The Great Lakes
programme.desc: The discovery of a human skull in the depths of Lake Superior begins a story that will take historian and author Brendon Baillod across two Great Lakes and a century of history. It takes him and a team of elite technical divers more than 20 miles off Milwaukee where they discover the wreck of one of Lake Michigan's lost queens. It takes them to the remote waters of Lake Superior where they risk their lives to determine the identity of yet another lost ship. And it takes us into the forgotten life of a brave and stubborn woman who lived, and died, on these wild waters. Whether her presence cursed these lost ships, or a more earthly explanation can be found, the Great Lakes' reputation as a graveyard for mariners stands firm(n)

programme.title: Napoleon - pohod na Rusiju
Napoleon: The Campaign of Russia
programme.desc: Dolazak u Moskvu 14. rujna 1812. uništio je sve iluzije. Napoleon koji je sanjao o trijumfalnom ulasku otkrio je napušteni grad u pepelu. Otrovni dar koji se pokazao pogubnim. Godine 1812. Napoleon je okupio vojsku od 600 000 vojnika, pripadnika 24 različita naroda, najveću vojsku ikad stvorenu. Protivno savjetima svojih najbližih savjetnika, maršira prema Moskvi odlučan u namjeri da pokori Rusiju. 172 dana poslije, Napoleon se povlači i iza sebe ostavlja 400 000 svojih vojnika, mrtvih ili zarobljenih. Ova dokumentarna drama prikazuje ovu najznamenitiju i najlegendarniju vojnu kampanju. Također pokušava otkriti zašto je Napoleon odlučio osvojiti Rusiju, kako je najveći vođa tog vremena mogao počiniti toliko strateških pogrešaka i kako su ga doživljavali Rusi, drugi europski vladari i njegove vlastite trupe(n)

programme.title: Linije razdvajanja
programme.desc: 11. marta 2013. godine, guverner Wisconsina Scott Walker je odobrio zakon kojim se odobrava iskopavanje željezne rude u području planinskog lanca Penokee bogatog šumom. Tom odlukom došlo je do „borbe između kompanija koje žele esploatisati taj prostor, a samim tim i otvoriti nova radna mjesta i, s druge strane, lokalnog stanovništva, ekoloških udruženja indijanskih plemena i političkih lidera koji žele da ovaj dio Wisconsina ostane netaknut i sačuvan, s ciljem zaštite očuvanje zemljišta i voda od zagađenja(n)

programme.title: Rađanje zemlje
programme.desc: Najprometnija skandinavska luka u gradu Gothenburgu uvodi mjere zaštite od zagađenja okoliša koje uzrokuju teretni brodovi. Osim toga, donosimo priču Engleza Adama Smitha, začetnika pokreta nazvanog „Real Junk Food Project koji poprima globalne razmjere. Time čini značajan korak u borbi za očuvanje životne sredine(n)

programme.title: Ritam Balkana
programme.desc: Serijal „Ritam Balkana kroz deset polusatnih epizoda istražuje muzičko blago zemalja regije - od tradicionalnih formi do savremenih žanrova i stilova. Otkriva koliko su isprepleteni lokalni tradicionalni muzički izrazi i u kojoj su mjeri na njih utjecali susjedi, zapadne i istočne kulture. „Ritam Balkana pravi presjek ovdašnje muzičke scene, predstavlja afirmisane autore i mlade stvaraoce te razotkriva koliko su politička i društvena događanja kreirala njihove stavove i karijere(n)

programme.title: Hoću kući
programme.desc: Stručnjak za umjetnu inteligenciju i bivši uposlenik Googlea Igor Trajkovski i glumac svjetskog glasa i vječni boem Rade Šerbedžija govore o povratku zemlji i porodici, kao i ulozi koju mediji mogu imati u tom procesu. Igor nam opisuje kako je, baveći se idejom povratka u Makedoniju, za vlastite potrebe napravio news-agregator kako bi dobio što objektivniju sliku stanja u državi, a danas je to najpopularniji internetski portal u državi s tendencijom da osvoji i regiju. Na sebi svojstven način, Rade govori o putovanjima po svijetu i svojim mnogim "domovima", te nas, sa kćerkom Ninom, vodi tamo gdje se najviše osjeća "kod kuće" - uz kamin u prelijepoj istarskoj kamenoj kući(n)

programme.title: Priče s Istoka
programme.desc: U Pakistanu, stvaranje muzike može imati smrtonosne posljedice. Vjerski tvrdolinijaši popularnu muziku doživljavaju neislamskom, a pod takvim prijetnjama rijetko se ko usuđuje javno baviti njome. Mnogi muzičari su ubijeni, drugi su pobjegli iz zemlje. Oni što su ostali u stalnom su strahu - prijeti im se smrću i često su veoma siromašni. Zlatno doba za muziku u toj zemlji seže u 60-te godine prošlog vijeka, kada su se na sve strane razvijali mnogi muzički žanrovi i pravci. Današnji mladi muzičari se bore da vrate duh tih vremena. Može li se u Pakistan vratiti „muzička scena u okvirima kojih je bila(n)

programme.title: Ljudi i moć
programme.desc: Donosimo priču o pionirskom pristupu u liječenju mentalnih bolesti koji pomaže u borbi protiv te širom svijeta najviše zanemarene bolesti(n)

programme.title: Neočekivano prijateljstvo
programme.desc: Film je priča o nesvakidašnjem prijateljstvu između Admira, vojnog policajca Armije BiH i njegovog zarobljenika Ratka, visokog oficira bivše JNA koje započinje u Sarajevu, u maju 1992. i koje traje do danas. Kroz prisjećanja glavnih aktera ove priče publika saznaje kako je uopšte došlo do njihovog susreta u ratnom Sarajevu i kako se rodilo iskreno, trajno i nadasve neočekivano prijateljstvo između ove dvojice ljudi(n)

programme.title: Priče s Istoka
programme.desc: U ovoj epizodi serijala 'Priče s istoka' smo u Australiji, gdje reporter Al Jazeere istražuje i prati priču koja je potresla javnost ne samo u Australiji nego i širom svijeta. U saveznoj državi Novi Južni Weles pokrenuta je široka istraga, koju vodi glavni inspektor Peter Fox, o dugogišnjem zlostavljanju djece od katoličkih svećenika, gdje su se pojavile strašne slike bluda nad nevinom djecom koji su počinili pojedini svećenici. Je li vrh Katoličke crkve znao za te zločine i je li ih, zarad viših intresa , godinama zataškavao(n)

programme.title: Regioskop
programme.desc: Balkan se smatra evropskim buretom baruta, regijom koja je zapalila fitilj Velikog rata u kojem su milioni ljudi širom svijeta izgubili živote. Od kraja doba carstava do napretka nacionalističkih pokreta i izbijanja rata, u šest nastavaka ovog filma koriste se rijetki arhivski snimci i donosi značajna nova revizija balkanske historije, povodom 100. godišnjice početka Prvog svjetskog rata(n)
programme.category: Regioskop - Rat i mir na Balkanu

programme.title: Moja Nigerija

programme.title: Nepoznata Afrika
programme.desc: Sahara je dom Tuarega hiljadama godina. Oni su zadržali svoj nomadski život - putovanja. Ali to je egzistencija koja je sada pod prijetnjom. Više od deset godina primirja Tuarezi se ponovo bore sa vladom u Nigeru.(n)

programme.title: Put do svjetskih šampiona
programme.desc: Došla je i ’70-ta, sašiveni su novi svileni dresovi, Tito je na tribinama, Svjetsko prvenstvo počinje. Prvi meč s Italijanima, zaglušujuća buka s tribina, našima ne ide... i onda kao da se desi čudo koje nas je sigurno vodilo do zlata(n)

programme.title: Širom svijeta
programme.desc: Ekonomska kriza u Španiji 2008. godine uzrokovala je da više od šest miliona ljudi izgubi posao. Stopa nezaposlenosti se, prema podacima iz 2013. godine, popela na 29%. Gubitkom poslova u svojoj zemlji, mnogi mladi ljudi, svih zanimanja i profesija, odlučili su potražiti sreću u drugim zemljama. Sve više njih dolazi u Maroko - Gibraltarskim prolazom odvojen i udaljen - samo 14 km od Španije. Međutim, dolaskom u tu zemlju, suočavaju se s jezičkom i kulturnom barijerom. Ipak, za mnoge od njih Maroko je obećana zemlja(n)
